divs: Sighting DetailsIt was about twelve midnight, I was driving easbound, when I noticed two bright lights in the distance off to the North. They appeared as though they were stationary, so I thought they must be helicopters or possibly stars. I didn't think anything of it at first, but I noticed one of the lights was slowly getting closer. As it gradually came nearer I noticed it was a cluster of lights. The object appeared to have three distinct lights on three corners of the vehicle. It appeared to have red lights and faint pulsating dim lights on the underbelly. I wanted to believe it was an airplane, but it moved like no other vehicle I have seen before. The object appeared to be extremely low for an airplane, and it was completely silent.
Summary: Triangular in shape, bright lights on all corners of object with red lights underneath.
trends: There have been 62 other sightings in Memphis
There were no other sightings in Memphis on or around June 23rd 2011
